ProjectTitle: The relationship between the Van Eyck workshop and Petrus Christus
InitialFeedbackHistory:
23/08/2022
You now submitted the data management information that was asked for in the proposal. At this stage of the project FWO asks a more elaborate data management plan. To write this you can use DMPonline KU Leuven (https://dmponline.kuleuven.be/), selecting the FWO template, here you can also find guidance. Alternatively, you can use the word template that you can find on the FWO website (www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/). You can find more information on our RDM website: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp and in the RDM guide https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.4115075. If you have further questions please contact nele.noppe@kuleuven.be
label: good with suggestions
